title: Clean Up
description: Remove outdated records from the database using DELETE statement with proper WHERE clause.
story: Some test records were accidentally added to the citizens database. Delete all citizens who live in the 'TestDistrict'.
hint: DELETE FROM citizens WHERE district = 'TestDistrict'. ALWAYS use WHERE or you'll delete everything!
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS citizens CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), age INT, district VARCHAR(50));
